EmailTemplate.name: Lead In Meeting Fixed Stage Overdue
EmailTemplate.subject: Lead In Meeting Fixed Stage For More Than a Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.OwnerFullName},
The Lead {!Lead.Name} is in "Meeting Fixed" stage for more than a day. Please take appropriate actions on the Lead to move the lead from the "Meeting Fixed" stage to Meeting Done/Meeting Follow-up stage.
Also please update AF asap according to the action taken. Click on the following link to go to the Lead's page: {!Lead.Name}
Regards, Ffreedom Team.
